#summary Notes on things to do with the SVN repository

All new text files should have the following properties set:

 * `svn propset svn:keywords "Id Release" <file>`
 * `svn propset svn:eol-style "native" <file>`

The root directory of the repository has the follwoing set for its `svn:ignore' patterns:

 * `Makefile`
 * `bm_to_blib`
 * `blib/*`
